mapper.insert: insert into upp_column ( column_id, column_name, column_desc, data_type_cd, data_length, data_scale, is_pk, is_nullable ) values ( #{column_id}, #{column_name}, #{column_desc jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{data_type_cd}, #{data_length}, #{data_scale jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{is_pk}, #{is_nullable} )
mapper.select: select a.column_id, a.column_name, a.column_desc, a.data_type_cd, a.data_length, a.data_scale, a.is_pk, a.is_nullable, a.obj_status_cd from upp_column a where a.column_id = #{column_id}
mapper.update: update upp_column a set a.column_name = #{column_name}, a.column_desc = #{column_desc jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a.data_type_cd = #{data_type_cd}, a.data_length = #{data_length}, a.data_scale = #{data_scale jdbcType=DECIMAL}, a.is_pk = #{is_pk}, a.is_nullable = #{is_nullable} where a.column_id = #{column_id}
mapper.select: select a.column_id, a.column_name, a.column_desc, a.data_type_cd, a.data_length, a.data_scale, a.is_pk, a.is_nullable, a.obj_status_cd, b.display_order from upp_column a, upp_metadata b where a.column_id = b.metadata_id and b.prt_metadata_id = #{table_id} order by b.display_order

select a.column_id, a.column_name, a.column_desc, a.data_type_cd, a.data_length, a.data_scale, a.is_pk, a.is_nullable, a.obj_status_cd from upp_column a, upp_metadata b, upp_dic_fn_rela c where a.column_id = b.metadata_id and b.prt_metadata_id = c.db_obj_id and c.metadata_id = #{rela_id}
